blocks.text: The following example combines the methods of solution employed in Examples 17, 18, and 20.

blocks.description: A second-order linear ordinary differential equation with a sinusoidal forcing function.

blocks.latex: y = A e^{\frac{-x}{12}} + B e^{\frac{-x}{12}} + \frac{1}{12} \left( A_1 \sin 60x + A_2 \cos 60x \right)
